org.lightningj.paywall.spring

Class PaywallProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.PaywallProperties

  • @Configuration
public class PaywallProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring bean containing all paywall related configuration settings.

    • Method Detail

      • getLndHostname

        public java.lang.String getLndHostname()
        Method that should return the hostname of IP address of the LND node to connect to.
        Returns:
        the hostname of IP address of the LND node to connect to.

      • getLndPort

        public java.lang.String getLndPort()
        Method that should return the port number of the LND node to connect to.
        Returns:
        the port number of the LND node to connect to.

      • getLndTLSCertPath

        public java.lang.String getLndTLSCertPath()
        The path to the LND tls certificate to trust, securing the communication to the LND node. Should point to an file readable by the current user.
        Returns:
        the path to the tls cert path.

      • getLndMacaroonPath

        public java.lang.String getLndMacaroonPath()
        The path to the macaroon file that is used to authenticate to the LND node. The macaroon should have invoice creation rights.
        Returns:
        the path to the macaroon to use.

      • getLndConnectString

        public java.lang.String getLndConnectString()
        The connect string displayed in node info part of generated invoices. It only needed to set this property if "paywall.lnd.connectstring" is set to true and macaroon used to connect to LND doesn't have access rights to retrieve information. The connect string can be fetched using 'lncli getinfo' command.
        Returns:
        the connect string

      • getLndNetwork

        public java.lang.String getLndNetwork()
        The network the LND node is connected to. (Optional) If LND macaroon used have access right to fetch information, this can be done automatically. Default UNKNOWN The current network can be fetched using 'lncli getinfo' command. And valid values are MAIN_NET, TEST_NET and UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        the path to the macaroon to use.

      • getLndCurrencyCode

        public java.lang.String getLndCurrencyCode()
        The currency code the connected LND Node used. Should be one of CryptoAmount constants 'BTC' or 'LTC'. Default value is 'BTC'.
        Returns:
        the lnd currency code to use. (Default, 'BTC')

      • getLightningHandlerAutoconnect

        public java.lang.String getLightningHandlerAutoconnect()
        True if BasePaymentHandler should connect automatically to Lightning Node upon initialization of bean. if false should the implementing application connect the lightning handler manually during startup.
        Returns:
        "true" or "false" (Default is "true").

      • getKeymgrAsymTruststorePath

        public java.lang.String getKeymgrAsymTruststorePath()
        Returns the path of directory where trusted public key files are stored.
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where trusted public key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.

      • getKeymgrKeystorePath

        public java.lang.String getKeymgrKeystorePath()
        Returns the path of directory where key files are stored.
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.

      • getKeymgrPassword

        public java.lang.String getKeymgrPassword()
        Method to retrieve the configured pass phrase used to protect generated keys.
        Returns:
        the configured protect pass phrase or null if no passphrase is configured.

      • getJwtTokenNotBefore

        public java.lang.String getJwtTokenNotBefore()
        Returns:
        the time in seconds for the not before field in generated JWT tokens. This can be positive if it should be valid in the future, or negative to support skewed clocked between systems. If unset is no not before date set in the generated JWT tokens.

      • getInvoiceRegisterNew

        public java.lang.String getInvoiceRegisterNew()
        Returns:
        true If settled invoice are received before any order have been created it should registered as new payments automatically before marking them as settled.

      • getInvoiceDefaultValidity

        public java.lang.String getInvoiceDefaultValidity()
        Returns:
        the default validity for generated invoices if no expire date have been set explicit in PaymentData.

      • getInvoiceIncludeNodeInfo

        public java.lang.String getInvoiceIncludeNodeInfo()
        Returns:
        true if node connection information should be included in generated invoices.

      • getSettlementDefaultValidity

        public java.lang.String getSettlementDefaultValidity()
        Returns:
        the default validity for generated settlements if no valid until date have been set explicit in PaymentData.

      • getCheckSettlementURL

        public java.lang.String getCheckSettlementURL()
        Returns:
        the url to the check settlement controller.

      • getQrCodeDefaultWidth

        public java.lang.String getQrCodeDefaultWidth()
        Returns:
        default QR Code width if no width parameter is specified in QR Code generation request.

      • getQrCodeDefaultHeight

        public java.lang.String getQrCodeDefaultHeight()
        Returns:
        default QR Code width if no height parameter is specified in QR Code generation request.

      • getQrCodeUrl

        public java.lang.String getQrCodeUrl()
        Returns:
        The URL to controller that generates QR code images.

      • getWebSocketEnable

        public java.lang.String getWebSocketEnable()
        Returns:
        returns string "true" if WebSocket functionality should be enabled.

      • getWebSocketCheckSettlementUrl

        public java.lang.String getWebSocketCheckSettlementUrl()
        Returns:
        the URL end point where check settlement Web Socket is listening.
